casebody.data:
No. 09-1403. Erica P. John Fund, Inc., fka Archdiocese of Milwaukee Supporting Fund, Inc., Petitioner v. Halliburton Co., et al. 562 U.S. 821, 131 S. Ct. 380,

178 L. Ed. 2d 16,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6182. October 4, 2010.

The Acting Solicitor General is invited to file a brief in this case expressing the views of the United States.

Same case below, 597 F.3d 330.
